name: electrodb
description: A library to more easily create and interact with multiple entities and heretical relationships in dynamodb

scripts.test-all-local: LOCAL_DYNAMO_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:8000 node ./test/init.js && LOCAL_DYNAMO_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:8000 mocha ./test/**.spec.js && LOCAL_DYNAMO_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:8000 npm run test-ts && npm run test-types
scripts.coverage: nyc npm run test-all && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.coverage-coveralls-local: nyc npm run test-all-local && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.coverage-html-local: nyc npm run test-all-local && nyc report --reporter=html

author: Tyler W. Walch
